article_title: Gate.io Supports Frontier (FRONT) to Self Chain (SLF) Token Migration
event_summary: Gate.io will support the migration of Frontier (FRONT) tokens to Self Chain (SLF) tokens at a 1:1 ratio. The migration involves disabling certain services for FRONT, including margin borrowing, futures trading, and spot trading, with specific deadlines for users to adjust their strategies and close positions.
user_action_required: Users should adjust trading strategies, close futures positions, redeem assets in Simple Earn, and repay outstanding loans before the specified deadlines to avoid automatic settlement or liquidation.
quantifiable_changes: Total token supply increases from 90 million to 360 million
